title: misc/trace: backport trace viewer fix to 1.6
body:
I'm not sure how far away Go 1.7 is, but if it is not soon, would it be possible to backport https://github.com/golang/go/commit/2c9d773f7411de211389b9e1da441fae68f826d8 to the next 1.6 point release? As new versions of Chrome roll-out, `go tool trace` is effectively broken.

I'm not sure how heavily used the feature is, but I use it occasionally to trace goroutine execution and syscalls.

CC @dvyukov
